title: a timeline on the 60's
content:
yo guys,  
i got this information graphics project to do right? and we have to make a timeline including all fashion, design, indutrial, politics, blah blah blah. but most things about art, design and typography. so i was wondering if you creative minds could help me out with any other ideas. i already got a bunch but i wanted to get a head start for the next crit. so any designers of the 60's of any country, and any cool album covers or whatever would help alot thanks.  
jl
author: Jasonlee

comments.content:
American Type Design and Designers by David Consuegra has a nice timeline.  
 [http://www.victormoscoso.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023501/http:/www.victormoscoso.com/ "http://www.victormoscoso.com/")
The [Realist](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023501/http:/www.ep.tc/realist/) might be a publication to look at.
